This spell recreates the legendary enchantment of Asg√•rd. The fortress is surrounded by a ring wall of enchanted flames. The flames are able to read the intentions of those who approach and will let friends pass safely through. Flying beings are able to pass over the flames.
All enemies passing through the flames will suffer 10 AP fire dmg.
